description:
Spacious, sunny and CLEAN one bedroom apartment - you will have the place all to yourself. It's located just 1.5 blocks from the subway at the Jefferson L stop, just 20 minutes to Manhattan. The neighborhood is lively with lots of bars and restaurants, a wine shop, a nightclub, plus a 24-hour grocery store you can see from the front steps. The kitchen is fully equipped. Hope you enjoy your stay!

https://www.airbnb.com/locations/new-york/bushwick
(URL HIDDEN)

The apartment is 1.5 blocks from the subway, off of the L train at Jefferson. This line takes you into Manhattan in less than 20 minutes and keeps running all the way across town. 30 minute cab ride to JFK or LaGuardia.
name: Spacious and clean 1 bedroom - Brooklyn
review: The closeness to the train is convenient and the space was well enough for two people. It is as the pictures show and was a great stay.
